item.description: This report shows the applied checklists and criteria to your project in a friendly word processor format.

Item.description: This report shows the checklist items and their associated responses and evaluations with 1 checklist item per page.

item.description: This report shows the IA, TA, and Standards and Conditions Scorecards for this project in a friendly table format for export.

Item.description: This report shows the BP Scorecards for this project in a friendly table format for export.

item.description: This reports on all Components at per project.
This reports on all project management data including issues, risks, etc per Project.
This report shows the minimun values of As-Is, To-Be of Business Architecture Maturity for the project.

Item.description: This report shows the As-Is, To-Be and Summary Responses for the project.

item.description: This report shows the As-Is, To-Be and Summary Responses for the project.
This report shows the eSS-A Report as per CMS Requirement.
This report shows the Business Architecture profile in eSS-A format
This report shows the Information Architecture profile in eSS-A format
This report shows the Technical Architecture profile in eSS-A format
This report shows the Standards and Conditions profile in eSS-A format
Select this report to export checklists. You may customize this report to include any active checklist on the project.
This report will show you a list of repository items for the selected ptoject, as well as global artifacts

Item.description: Report containing IA,TA, Standards and Conditions and BCM scorecards, by as-is, to-be, and project impact.
